name: cypress-circleci-coverage
description: Generate coverage data for CircleCI's Smarter Testing

scripts.generate: circleci run testsuite 'integration test' --local --test-analysis=all && cat coverage.json | jq --sort-keys > coveragetmp.json && mv coveragetmp.json coverage.json
scripts.generate:ci: circleci run testsuite 'integration test' --test-analysis=all && cat coverage.json | jq --sort-keys > coveragetmp.json && mv coveragetmp.json coverage.json
